argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ngpds2.x | |- X = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | ngpds2.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | ngpds2.m | |- .- = ( -g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | ngpds2.d | |- D = ( dist ` G ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_ngpds2 | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A D B ) = ( ( A .- B ) D .0. ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_ngpxms | |- ( G e. NrmGrp -> G e. *MetSp ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> G e. *MetSp ) |
| 8 |  | #P_ngpgrp | |- ( G e. NrmGrp -> G e. Grp ) |
| 9 | 1, 3 | #P_grpsubcl | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A .- B ) e. X ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A .- B ) e. X ) |
| 11 | 8 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> G e. Grp ) |
| 12 | 1, 2 | #P_grpidcl | |- ( G e. Grp -> .0. e. X ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> .0. e. X ) |
| 14 | 1, 4 | #P_xmssym | |- ( ( G e. *MetSp /\ ( A .- B ) e. X /\ .0. e. X ) -> ( ( A .- B ) D .0. ) = ( .0. D ( A .- B ) ) ) |
| 15 | 7, 10, 13, 14 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( A .- B ) D .0. ) = ( .0. D ( A .- B ) ) ) |
| 16 | 5, 15 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A D B ) = ( .0. D ( A .- B ) ) ) |
